scripts.clean:dist-ts: test -d dist && find dist -type f \( -name "*.js" -o -name "*.d.ts" \) -delete || true
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && npm run clean:dist-ts && cp package.json dist/package.json && cd ./src && npx tsc
scripts.publish: mkdir -p dist && rm -rf dist/* && cp package.json dist/package.json && cp README.md ./dist/README.md && cp ./LICENSE.md ./dist/LICENSE.md && cd ./src && npx tsc
scripts.compile:fresh: npm run clean:dist-ts && cd src && npx tsc --watch
